meteringrange: With aperture 1.0 / ISO 320/26Â°: EV 1 to 21  Flashing of the left-hand triangular LED in the viewfinder indicates  that the brightness reflected is below the metering range.
viewfinderprinciple: Large, light bright-line rangefinder with automatic parallax  compensation.
powersupply: One lithium-ion rechargeable battery, rated voltage 3.7 V, capacity  1900 mAh. Capacity display in monitor; with shutter held open (for  sensor cleaning) additional acoustic warning of low capacity.
shutterspeeds: In automatic mode (A) steplessly from 32 s to 1/4000 s. Using  manual setting 8 s to 1/4000 s in half steps, B for long exposures  up to max. 240 s 1/180 s fastest shutter speed for flash  synchronization.
displaysinflashmode: Ready: By the flash symbol LED in the viewfinder being constantly  lit; confirmation of success: By the LED remaining lit or flashing  rapidly for a while after taking the picture; underexposure display  by the LED going out for a while.
sensitivityrange: ISO 320/26Â° to ISO 10000/41Â°, adjustable in 1/3-ISO stages, with  automatic timer (A) and manual exposure setting, optionally  automatic control or manual adjustment. ISO 160 additionally  available as pull function.
resolutions: Adjustable, DNGâ¢: 5212 x 3468 (18 megapixels), JPEG: 5216 x  3472 (18 megapixels), 3840 x 2592 (10 megapixels), 2592 x 1728  (4.5 megapixels), 1728 x 1152 (2 megapixels), 1280 x 864 (1  megapixel).
eyepiece: Adjusted to -0.5 dpt. Corrective lenses from -3 to +3 dpt. available.
selftimer: Delay optionally 2 (aperture priority and manual exposure setting)  or 12 s (menu setting), indicated by flashing LED on front of  camera and corresponding display on the monitor.
batterycharger: Inputs: 100-240 V AC, 50/60 Hz, automatic switching, or 12/24V  DC; Output: 4.2 V DC, 800 mA.
tripodthread: A 1/4 (1/4 â) DIN, stainless steel, integrated in base plate
flashexposuremetering: Control with center-weighted TTL pre-flash metering (with SCA-  3501/3502 adapter, or SCA-3000 standard flash unit such as  Leica SF 24D/Leica SF 58).
flashexposurecompensation: Â±3 1/3-EV in 1/3-EV stages adjustable at SCA-3501/3502 adapter.  On the Leica SF 24D with computer control it is possible to  program Â±3 EV in 1/3-EV stages, or from 0 to -3 EV in 1-EV  stages; on the Leica SF 58 Â±3 EV can be programmed in 1/3-EV  stages in all modes.
filesizes: DNGâ¢: 18 MB (compressed), 36 MB (uncompressed), JPEG:  approx. 2â10 MB.
shutterrelease: Three-stage: Exposure metering on â Metering memory lock (in  aperture priority mode) â Shutter release. Integrated standard  cable release thread.
interface: 5-pin Mini-USB 2.0 high-speed port for fast data transfer
storagemedia: SD cards up to 2 GB, SDHC cards up to 32 GB.
lensmount: Leica M bayonet with additional sensor for 6-bit coding.
compatibility: WindowsÂ® 7 SP1, WindowsÂ® VistaÂ® SP2, Windows XP SP2,  MacÂ® OS X 10.6.8 (Snow Leopard) or higher.
cameratype: Compact digital rangefinder system camera with black-and-white sensor
imagesensor: Active area approx. 23.9 x 35.8 mm, 5212 x 3468 pixels (18  megapixels). Infrared filter for non-visible spectrum over 700nm,  no low-pass filter
lenssystem: Leica M lenses from 16 to 135 mm.
shutter: Microprocessor-controlled, ultra-quiet metal leaf slotted shutter with vertical movement.
menulanguages: German, English, French, Spanish, Italian, Japanese, Traditional  Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Russian.
packagecontents: 100 - 240 V charger with two power cables (EU, USA; some export  markets differ) and one vehicle charging cable; lithium-ion battery;  USB cable; real-leather carrying strap; original Leica Monochrom  print of a campaign motif; user manual; information material for  registration and software downloading
exposuremetering: Through the Lens (TTL) metering, center-weighted with variable  aperture. Center-weighted TTL metering for flash exposure with  system-conformant SCA-3000/2 standard flash units.
